availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Leonard B. Cox (Fleming County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, attorney. Virginia native. Married to Elenor T. Wilmot Cox in Garrard County, Kentucky, on July 27, 1838. Father of Emily Cox, Mary L. Cox, Samuel W. Cox, Thomas S. Cox, and John S. Cox. Attorney in Springfield, Kentucky, in 1850. Attorney in Fleming County in 1860. Presiding judge in Fleming County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, Springfield, p. 237B-238A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, District 2, p. 615.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Garrard County Marriages, Film #000183256, p. 11.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1863,” in 1864 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 10. (Frankfort, Ky.: Wm. E. Hughes, State Printer, 1864), 304.
